data.page_description: This is a test page for Auto Mode functionality. It contains various exercises and questions designed to test the AI-powered guidance system.

guidance.title: **Introduction to the Exercise**
guidance.description: Welcome to this interactive learning experience. In this section, we'll guide you through understanding the basic concepts presented on this page.

guidance.title: Step 1: Read the Instructions
guidance.description:
Start by carefully reading all the instructions provided on the page.

Pay attention to any highlighted text or special formatting.

Make sure you understand what is being asked before proceeding to the next step.

guidance.title: Step 2: Analyze the Questions
guidance.description:
Look at each question individually.

Identify the key concepts being tested.

Think about what knowledge or skills you need to apply to answer correctly.

guidance.title: Step 3: Apply Your Knowledge
guidance.description:
Now it's time to put your understanding into practice.

Work through each problem systematically.

Don't rush - take your time to think through each step.

If you get stuck, review the previous guidance steps.

guidance.title: Step 4: Review Your Answers
guidance.description:
Once you've completed all the questions, take a moment to review your work.

Check for any obvious errors or omissions.

Make sure your answers make sense in the context of the questions.
